title: Presserator
summaries: The Presserator is an accessory that, when equipped, automatically places Actuators to objects when placing them. It requires Actuators to be in the player's inventory in order to function. The Presserator is purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 10.

The Presserator can be used as long as it is in the player's inventory or equipped. When held or equipped, a marker appears in the top left corner of the screen that can toggle the automatic placement of actuators.

statistics.Tooltip: Automatically places actuators on placed objects
statistics.Buy: 10
statistics.Sell: 2
